description: Approval of Details Pursuant of Condition 13 (Landscaping) parts A (Trees and Planters) and B (Soft Planting) only, of Planning permission reference P2017/3103/FUL, dated 12 September 2018 for the "Demolition of the existing buildings and erection of a 27-storey building (part 10, part 15, part 20, part 27 storeys) with 3 basement levels to provide office floorspace (Use Class B19(a)) and flexible retail/ professional services/ restaurant/cafe floorspace (Use Class A1/A2/A3) along with associated access and servicing arrangements, cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping works."
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: You are advised that this decision notice grants approval of parts a) and b) of planning permission Ref: P2017/3103/FUL, dated 12/09/2018 only. 

Parts c), d), e), and f) of Condition 13 were previously discharged under application ref: P2022/3640/AOD, approved 20/01/2023. 

You are advised that Condition 13 has now been fully discharged.
